Name: Grounded Sim: Steam Edition
About the game: About- You wake up outside of a bar and follow a strange man through a portal...Grounded Sim is a survival horror where you have to find all 8 'Cheesy Chase' Tokens. Can You Unlock all 3 Endings? You Play as an Unnamed Player Who Drunkenly Walks into a portal because he followed a strange man! There's Segments of the game which are First and Third Person as Well! (This game does have controller support but it's not the most optimized so keyboard and mouse is recommended.) Gameplay- You end up in a forest and have nowhere to go but to follow a path. Look for all 8 Tokens so you can leave the area and hopefully return to your home! You will be chased by something or someone while looking for the coins so stay safe! You have limited amount of battery and your stamina will need to recharge after running for a long amount of time! That's Just The First Act, There's More Levels and More To Come in The Future!
